body_html:
I can repro this on master. We'll fix this sometime.

This is indeed very related to #5014, because slicing with a zero-slice should result in tensor with 0 size zero in that dimension, but we don't support that at the moment. I'm wondering if it's worth special casing this right now to return an empty tensor (or throw an error).

This is indeed very related to #5014, because slicing with a zero-slice should result in tensor with 0 size zero in that dimension, but we don't support that at the moment. I'm wondering if it's worth special casing this right now to return an empty tensor (or throw an error).
body:
I can repro this on master. We'll fix this sometime.

This is indeed very related to #5014, because slicing with a zero-slice **should** result in tensor with 0 size zero in that dimension, but we don't support that at the moment. I'm wondering if it's worth special casing this right now to return an empty tensor (or throw an error).
